## REQUIREMENTS

conan
cmake
bgfx
imgui

## Installation guide

``` bash
# hello world
conan install . --output-folder=out/build/x64-Debug --build=missing -s build_type=Debug -s compiler.cppstd=17
conan profile list
conan profile show default
conan profile update settings.compiler.cppstd=17 default
```
